subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: FIFA’s president, Sepp Blatter, promised an “in-depth investigation” into allegations by a British newspaper that two FIFA executive committee members offered to sell their votes in World Cup bidding.
snippet: FIFA’s president, Sepp Blatter, promised an “in-depth investigation” into allegations by a British newspaper that two FIFA executive committee members offered to sell their votes in World Cup bidding.
